company_questions.question: What is your company's address?
Who is the CFO of your company?
Who is the Financial Controller?
Who is the Finance Assistant?
What is your business activity/industry?
company_questions.context: Describe what your company does, what industry you operate in

company_questions.question: What is your business vision?
company_questions.context: What are your company's long-term goals and aspirations?

company_questions.question: What are your current business challenges?
company_questions.context: What problems or difficulties is your business facing?

company_questions.question: What is your project vision for implementing Sage Intacct?
company_questions.context: What do you hope to achieve with this ERP implementation?

company_questions.question: Why did you choose Sage Intacct?
Which Sage Intacct modules do you plan to use?
What existing software systems do you currently use?
company_questions.context: List your current accounting, ERP, or business software

company_questions.question: What are the benefits and limitations of your current systems?
Do you use any 3rd party applications or marketplace partners?
Describe your entity structure and hierarchy
company_questions.context: How is your company organized? Multiple entities, subsidiaries, etc.

company_questions.question: Which entities will be migrated to Sage Intacct? Include fiscal year and base currency for each
What are your reporting requirements by entity?
What are your reporting requirements by dimensions?
Any other reporting requirements?
How many business licenses do you need?
How many employee licenses do you need? (Sold in packs of 10)
What is your target go-live date?

security_questions.question: Who will be administering the Intacct account?
What are your password requirements? (Default: 8 characters, Min: 8 Max: 72)
How often should users change their passwords? (Default: Quarterly, options: Weekly to Yearly)
How many password reset attempts per day? (Default: 5, Min: 1 Max: 10)
How many incorrect login attempts before lockout? (Default: 10, Min: 1 Max: 20)
Inactivity auto-logout preference? (Default: 6 hours, Min: 10 Minutes Max: 6 Hours)
Session auto-logout preference for workday? (Default: 6 hours, Min: 1 Hour Max: 24 Hours)
Do you require single sign-on (SSO) or standard sign-on?
Do you require two-step login verification? (Recommended: Enabled)
Do you want to use role-based permissions? (Recommended)
Do you need security restrictions by entity?
security_questions.context: For example: restricting access to customers, suppliers, bank accounts by entity

security_questions.question: Should the system automatically generate inter-entity transactions?
Do you need basic or advanced inter-entity mapping?
Should top level transactions be disabled to enforce subledger entity transactions?
Should AP and AR credits be restricted per entity?
Do you want to customize title bar, background, and text color per entity?
What is the base currency of each entity?

gl_questions.question: When does your financial year start?
How is your financial year defined?
gl_questions.context: For example: 12 monthly periods, 13 periods, etc.

gl_questions.question: How are periods within the financial year defined?
What are your requirements for closing an accounting period?
What currencies are involved in your transactions and where are they used?
gl_questions.context: For example: USD for purchases, EUR for sales, etc.

gl_questions.question: Do you require unrealized multicurrency gain/loss calculation on open transactions?
Do you require realized multicurrency gain/loss calculation on open transactions?
What are your security requirements for creating/deleting GL accounts?
Do you require statistical accounts for non-financial record keeping?
gl_questions.context: For example: square footage, headcount tracking

gl_questions.question: How should the system handle attachment numbering - auto or manual?
What is your Chart of Accounts format?
gl_questions.context: For example: 4 digits - 0100 for Office Equipment

gl_questions.question: What are your profit centers/departments/divisions?
Do any accounts require certain dimensions when used?
gl_questions.context: For example: Account 6000 - maintenance requires department

gl_questions.question: Do you need separate adjustment journals?
Do you need separate tax adjustment journals?
What other journal types do you need?
gl_questions.context: Default: GL, APJ, ARJ, CDJ, CRJ, etc.

gl_questions.question: Will you need to upload journal entries?
Do you need to capture dimension values with journal entries?
Do journals need to be balanced by dimension?
Do you require automatic GL value distribution to departments/locations?
Do you require journal entry approval?
Do you use recurring journal entries?
Do you use reversing journal entries?
How should the system handle future-dated journal entries?

financial_reports_questions.question: What are your security requirements for financial reports?
What financial reports do you require?
financial_reports_questions.context: For example: Profit and Loss, Balance Sheet, Cash Flow, etc.

financial_reports_questions.question: What GL dashboards do you require?
What comparative financial statements do you produce?
Do you have any unique reporting requirements?
Which dimensions are required for reporting?
At what level do you track assets and liabilities?
financial_reports_questions.context: For example: entity level, department level, division level

financial_reports_questions.question: What tax reporting requirements do you have?
financial_reports_questions.context: For example: not VAT registered, group VAT, etc.

cash_questions.question: Please detail your current and savings accounts including currencies
cash_questions.context: For example: 3 current accounts in GBP, 1 savings account in USD, 1 petty cash in EUR

cash_questions.question: Do you require bank accounts to be restricted at entity level?
How do you intend to reconcile bank accounts in Sage Intacct?
cash_questions.context: Options: bank feeds, manual entry, statement upload

cash_questions.question: Will bank accounts be reconciled at top level or entity level?
Do you intend to issue BACS payments to suppliers/employees?
cash_questions.context: For example: HSBC Net, Lloyds Commercial Banking

cash_questions.question: Do you require an undeposited funds GL account?
Do you have restrictions on future postings?
Do you use company credit cards?
Are multiple credit card accounts combined in single statements?
How will you handle credit card transactions - manual entry or import?
Will you reconcile credit cards using Sage Intacct?
Do you pay supplier invoices via credit card?
Do you transfer funds between bank accounts?
Do you transfer funds between entities?
Do you receive payments not associated with customers/invoices?
Do you make payments not associated with suppliers/invoices/employees?
What other transactions are processed through your bank accounts?
cash_questions.context: Besides supplier payments and customer receipts

ap_questions.question: How many suppliers are active?
Do you have a numbering scheme for suppliers?
Do you need to limit supplier access by entity?
Do you group suppliers in any way?
Do you track employees as suppliers?
Do you have suppliers with parent/child relationships?
In what currencies do you transact with suppliers?
Should contacts be restricted to their suppliers only in drop-downs?
What are your security requirements for creating new suppliers?
ap_questions.context: For example: Finance assistants access only

ap_questions.question: What payment terms do suppliers give you?
ap_questions.context: For example: Net 30, Due upon receipt

ap_questions.question: Do you record credit limits that suppliers assign to your company?
Do you use discounted payment terms?
How should the system respond when supplier credit limits are exceeded?
ap_questions.context: Options: Allow, Warn & Allow, Don't allow

ap_questions.question: Do you put suppliers on hold and how should the system respond?
How should the system handle future period posting?
Do you need numbering sequences for supplier credit/debit adjustments?
Should the system enforce unpaid invoice reversals or allow deletion?
Do you need recurring invoices?
How should the system handle duplicate invoice numbers?
Do you need automatic invoice allocation to departments/locations?
Do you need supplier transactions posted to multiple AP GL codes?
Do you require invoice approval based on amounts?
Describe your tax requirements on invoices
ap_questions.context: For example: VAT charged on UK suppliers only

ap_questions.question: Please describe your payment methods
What is your default payment method and bank account?
How frequently do you pay suppliers?
From how many bank accounts do you issue supplier payments?
What criteria do you use to select invoices for payment?
Do you require payment approvals based on amounts?
Do you pay deposits/advances to suppliers?
What are your aging period requirements?
Are aging periods based on invoice date or due date?
What supplier reports do you require?
Will AP dashboards be required?
Do you require specific dimension tracking?
Do you require custom fields for supplier reporting?

purchasing_questions.question: Describe your desired purchasing process from request to supplier invoice receipt
Detail each approval phase in your workflow
What specific purchasing documents are required in the workflow?
purchasing_questions.context: For example: Purchase Order, Goods Receipt

purchasing_questions.question: Describe your document numbering sequence for each workflow step
Are there editing/deleting restrictions throughout the workflow?
At which step should VAT be introduced?
Which workflow steps should post to AP and/or GL?
Will any transactions be integrated from external systems?
Do you require pricelists?
Do purchases need budget validation?
How are purchase orders provided to suppliers?
Describe purchase order format requirements and required fields
Do purchase orders require supplier-specific information like part numbers?
List and describe required shipping methods for purchase orders
Describe requirements for purchase order returns
How should blanket purchase orders be handled?
Can you define item groups for purchasing?
Should items be available in both purchasing and order entry?
Are multiple delivery addresses required?
Are goods received in multiple shipments (partial receipts)?
Are invoices ever processed without goods receipts?

ar_questions.question: How many customers are active?
Do you have a numbering scheme for customers?
Do you need to limit customer access by entity?
Do you group customers in any way?
Do you have customers with parent/child relationships?
In what currencies do you transact with customers?
What are your security requirements for creating new customers?
Do you have customers with multiple billing or shipping addresses?
Does one entity invoice or collect on behalf of another entity?
What payment terms do you give customers?
Do you assign credit limits to customers?
Do you use discounted payment terms?
How should the system respond when customer credit limits are exceeded?
Do you put customers on hold and how should the system respond?
Do you have a numbering sequence for invoices?
Do you need numbering sequences for customer credit/debit adjustments?
How should the system handle future period posting?
Should the system enforce unpaid invoice reversals or allow deletion?
How should the system handle duplicate invoice numbers?
Do you need automatic invoice allocation to departments/locations?
Do you need customer transactions posted to multiple AR GL codes?
Describe your tax requirements on customer invoices
How many customer payments do you receive per day/week/month?
Please describe your customer payment methods
Which bank accounts are used for customer payments?
What should be the default payment method and bank account?
Do you require an undeposited funds bank account?
Do you receive deposits from customers?
Do you receive payments in foreign currencies?
Do you receive partial payments from customers?
What address should customers send payment remittance to?
What are your aging period requirements?
Are aging periods based on invoice date or due date?
What operational reports do you require?
Will AR dashboards be required?
Do you require specific dimension tracking?
Do you require custom fields for customer reporting?

order_entry_questions.question: Please describe the goods or services you sell
Can you define item groups for order entry?
Describe your desired sales workflow
Which workflow steps should post to AR and/or GL?
What specific sales documents are required in the workflow?
Describe your document numbering sequence for each workflow step
Are there editing/deleting restrictions throughout the workflow?
At which step should VAT be introduced in the sales workflow?
Will any sales transactions be integrated from external systems?
Do you require recurring order entry transactions?
Do you require pricelists for sales?
Do you issue credits to customers?
How are sales orders provided to customers?
Describe sales order format requirements and required fields
Do sales orders require customer-specific information like part numbers?
List and describe shipping methods required for sales orders
Describe requirements for sales order returns
Do you require the ability to reclassify AR sales invoices and adjustments?
Do you need to control GL posting date separately from invoice date?
How do you distribute invoices to customers?
Will you import invoices or enter them manually?
What are your invoice format requirements?
order_entry_questions.context: Please provide a sample if possible

order_entry_questions.question: How should goods/services appear on your invoices?

pea_questions.question: What accounting periods will be used in Sage Intacct?
Are any methods other than straight-line used for amortization?
How are first and last month's amortization calculated?
Have any standard dimensions been renamed?
Are prepaid expenses amortized to single or multiple dimensions?
Are all amortization entries posted on a specific day of the month?
How many entities track and amortize prepaid expenses?
Does each entity have different base currencies?
Are prepaid expenses entered in base or transactional currencies?
Are dimensions required for expense and prepaid asset GL accounts?
How are prepaid expenses created - via AP invoices or purchasing transactions?
When entering AP invoices, do users select GL accounts or use account labels?
Are AP invoices manually entered or imported via CSV?
Where are AP invoices/purchasing transactions entered - top level or entity level?
Do AP or purchasing modules integrate with third-party systems?
What statuses are assigned to imported/integrated invoices?
Which purchasing transaction definitions post to AP?
How are credits treated against invoices being amortized as prepaid expenses?
Do you need to load existing prepaid schedules for go-live?
How many new prepaid schedules do you anticipate creating monthly?
What additional prepaid expense reports do you require beyond the standard 3?
pea_questions.context: Standard reports: Schedule Detail, Schedule Reconciliation, Schedule Forecast
